title: PAU Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the PAU Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are lo...
